data.persona: I live in the deep, dark caves of the kingdom. I sleep during the day and fly at night. I hang from the cave walls while I sleep.
data.description:
You are in the The tower base.
The tower base has a path of cobblestone leading to the entrance. Two torches are lit with large blazing fires. Most of the tower base is covered in moss.
There's a tower, a huge lock on door, a path, a moss, and a torch here.
The soldier is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: i need to find the way to the village
data.mid_motivation: i want to feed on the villagers
data.long_motivation: I will feed enough to transform back into vampire form and out of bat form

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat the blood of the villagers
